name: INV_TX_PIECES
description: This table contains Professional Billing charge transactions associated with invoice service lines.

columns.name: INV_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the invoice record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: TX_PIECE
columns.description: The position of the transaction ID in the comma-delimited list of transaction IDs for a given line.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The ID of the transaction associated with the claim line.
